attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.review: After I downloaded it and put in my information, not even 2 weeks later my instagram was turned into a trump fan page, this also happened to my twitter and Facebook. Not only that, but my Minecraft skin had a trumps face on it AND my username was changed to “grab me by the p***y 19” WHAT THE HECK IS GOING ON, I can’t believe this. IF THIS TWERP DELETS TIK TOK HE DOESNT KNOW WHATS COMING.

attributes.title: Honest Review
attributes.review: Attention: If you or a loved one has been diagnosed with Mesothelioma you may to be entitled to financial compensation. Mesothelioma is a rare cancer linked to asbestos exposure. Exposure to asbestos in they Navy, shipyards, mills, heating, construction or the automotive industries may put you at risk. Please don't wait, call 1-800-99 LAW USA today for a free legal consultation and financial information packet. Mesothelioma patients call now! 1-800-99 LAW USA

attributes.title: False advertising
attributes.review: I downloaded this app with the expectation to receive the royalties that come with being in the Republic party. I was expecting my taxes to be cut, enough “hush money” to rape women, my stocks to be sky rocketing, and a 3 million dollar mansion to show up in the Bahamas under my name. What I was given was a terrible application, an orange testicle shown everywhere, and AIDS. HOW DID AN APP GIVE ME AIDS?!!! I have no idea, but I will be suing the establishment and i will only be given a settlement if Tik Tok survives.

attributes.title: Overall horrible
attributes.review: This app is very glitchy and overall horrible. As well as the people that made this app have an immense amount of images that use a gross use of the American flag. They many times present things that are very much against flag code.
